long_description: Huff, puff, skate and glide your way to aerobic nirvana on the Atomic Pro Skate skis. Designed for entry-level and first-time skate skiers, these skis will perform well as your skill level improves. Sport Profile 3D single-camber ensures easy and efficient kicking and gliding, and direct power transfer from skier to the skis. Low-density, extremely lightweight Speedcell foam core offers springy rebound and won't weigh you down. Double-grooved base provides precise control and tracking, especially on hard-packed terrain. Waxable sintered bases on the Atomic Sport Pro Skate skis soak up wax for smooth and fast riding and gliding.
short_description: Huff, puff, skate and glide your way to aerobic nirvana on the Atomic Pro Skate skis. Designed for entry-level and first-time skate skiers, these skis will perform well as your skill level improves.
